title: Patching failing

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Patching always fails at this same file, with the same error message every time "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)"
I've restarted the client several times, and ran it as administrator as well, but same error.
Any suggestions?

replies.body: It looks like your patcher is trying to scan your game files for corrupt data, but a security setting or antivirus may be blocking it.  Running as admin is a good first step, but there are a few more steps you can take for a more permanent fix.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league is being added as an exception and get those files scanned.  I hope that helps!
